string.value: I better negotiate with #r#p2050002##k so the machine can be sent to Showa Town ASAP.

After eating lunch, #r#p2050002##k claims that he'll send the machine to Showa Town, no problem. \nThis really irritated me, but I'll have to gather up #b400#k #b#t4000117#s#k in order for that to happen.\r\n#t4000117# #b#c4000117##k/400
Just as #r#p2050002##k demanded, I got him #b400 #t4000117#s#k.
I know I can send you the machine... but...I'll do it if you get something for me. What do you think?
Well, it's nothing big ... and I need some stamina to transport this machine, you know, and I feel like eating lunch beforehand.
And so, I would like to eat my favorite, #b400#k #b#t4000117#s#k, so it would be nice for you to bring me lunch...
Hey, you seem strong enough. Just take care of the monsters around the area, and you'll have enough in a hurry. Hahaha!
Eh? That's alright. It's not like I'm going through too much trouble here, but I suggest you do things my way.
Wooo, not bad for a human. Well, let's be friends now~
As promised, the machine will be sent to #r#p9120005##k, so you should go there too and see it for yourself.
Are you kidding me? Don't mess with me, or I am not giving you the machine!
